title: The Business of aging
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Dennis McGann, Randy Sykes, Adam Symansky, Fred Tabachnick and Laszlo Barna
brief_description: This timely film raises the question of who should be entrusted with the care of the elderly and chronically ill—government-run or privately owned nursing homes. The Business of Aging looks into the quality of nursing home care in Canada and presents a sobering picture of residents caught in the financial squeeze as operators attempt to cut overheads at the expense of their patients.
